test.instr: (:ins (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X blue) (sort Y closet))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X closet))) (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X plant))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X white) (sort Y couch))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X blue) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X white) (sort Y closet))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X table)))) )
test.nl: There is bottle which is blue in the closet. The door of the cupboard is closed. The door of the closet is opened. Open the refrigerator. Go to the plant. Put a remotecontrol in the cupboard. Put a can which is white on the couch. Put the blue bottle on the cupboard. Put a book which is white on the closet. Do not go to the table.
